Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

Auto-panner Filter

Discussion

This filter allows the stereo signal to be panned at a fixed rate between the speakers.

Preferences:

"Auto Panner Rate": Speed of pan. Range: 0.0 to 10000.0 milliseconds (for a loop).

"Auto Panner Mode": Mode of pan. Range: 0.0 (loop) or 1.0 (ping-pong).


Group: Digital Filter Services
Related Sections: Compressor Filter, Volume Ramp Filter
